data.name: Fishing Planet: Green Fortune Pack
data.detailed_description:
We have prepared an incredible Green Fortune Pack specially for all St. Patrick's Day fans! This pack includes some great spinning and casting tackle and even the Gold Horseshoe Stringer, which you will need in order to catch the cunning Snakeheads! The Green Fortune Pack is nothing less than a treasure pot, with emerald- and gold-colored spinners, bass jigs, and poppers ready to attract fish from the water depths! And the cherry on top of this clover-green cake is a trendy Irish cap and an exclusive new flashlight! Rest assured that you will feel the true power of Irish luck when you find 7 POND PASSES in the pack: Everglades, Quanchkin, Sander Baggersee, Akhtuba, Weeping Willow, Blue Crab Island, and Marron!

Green Fortune Pack includes:
* 20000 CREDITS
* 13 BAITCOINS
* 7-DAYS PREMIUM
* 30 Slots
* 2 Tackle Setup Slots

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* RIVERTEX™ LuckySpin 8' 10" (270) - Length: 8' 10" (2.7 m) ; Lure Weight: 7/8 – 2 1/2 Oz. (25–70 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 7–28.5 Lb (4–13 kg); Action: Moderate
* RIVERTEX™ IrishHarper 8' 6" (260) - Length: 8' 6" (2.6 m); Lure Weight: 1/2 – 2 Oz (14–60 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 7–28.6 Lb (3–13 kg); Action: Moderate
Reels:
* MagFin™ LuckyReel 6500 - Ratio: 4.5; Recovery: 27.5" (70 cm); Capacity: Mono 32/130 (0.5/130), Braid 30/215 (0.28/215); Max Drag: 28.6 Lb (13 kg); Drag: Rear
* RIVERTEX™ GoldenHarp 5000 - Ratio: 6.3; Recovery: 31.5" (80 cm); Capacity: Mono 32/100 (0.5/100), Braid 30/170 (0.28/170); Max Drag: 27.5 Lb (12.5 kg); Brake: Centrifugal

TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length 1000 yd (1000 m):
* Fluoro .02" (0.5 mm) - Test: 28 Lb (12.7 kg)
* Braid .007" (0.19 mm) - Test: 26.6 Lb (12.1 kg)
* Emerald JigHead 6/7 Oz (25 g), #4/0 (x7)
* Clover Spoon 1/2 Oz (14 g), #2/0 (x13)
* Irish Bass Jig 1/2 Oz (14 g), #4/0 (x13)
* Spinnerbait Golden Tune 1 Oz (28 g), #4/0 (x13)
* Popper-Pint 1 Oz (28 g), #3/0 (x3)
* Stout Walker 1 Oz (28 g), #3/0 (x3)
* Frog-popper Rainbow Jump 5/8 Oz (18 g), #3/0 (x3)
* Swimbait Lucky Pot 1 2/3 Oz (48 g), #3/0 (x3)
* Leprechaun Buzzbait 1 Oz (28 g), #4/0 (x13)
* Irish Crayfish 4" (10 cm) (x13)

EQUIPMENT
* Patrick's Rod Case - Rods: 3; Reels: 3; Lines: 3
* RIVERTEX™ Shamrock Headlamp - Lighting Range: 50 yd (50 m); Lighting Spot Angle: 1.5 yd (1.5 m); Lighting Tone: Green
* Shamrock Trucker - Tackles: 3
* Golden Horseshoe Stringer - Max Single Fish Weight: 28.6 Lb (13 kg); Total Fish Weight: 463 Lb (210 kg)

EVENT ITEMS:
* 777 Сlover Coins

POND PASSES (7 days):
Everglades Pass
Quanchkin Pass
Sander Baggersee Lake Pass
Akhtuba River Pass
Weeping Willow Fisheries Pass
Blue Crab Island Pass
Marron River Pass

FISHING LICENSES (7 days):
Advanced Florida License
Advanced Louisiana License
Advanced Germany License
Advanced Russia License
Advanced United Kingdom License
Advanced Mississippi License
Advanced Bolivia License

data.short_description: We have prepared an incredible Green Fortune Pack specially for all St. Patrick's Day fans! This pack includes some great spinning and casting tackle and even the Gold Horseshoe Stringer, which you will need in order to catch the cunning Snakeheads!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Traditional Chinese, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS Version - Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
